Info

Defines class XmlBase with attribute(s) and method(s). Loads ATS configuration/information, setup ATS CL interface.

class ats_utilities.config_io.xml.XmlBase(information_file: str | None, verbose: bool = False)[source]¶

Bases: object

Defines class XmlBase with attribute(s) and method(s). Loads ATS configuration/information, setup ATS CL interface. Configuration base XML API support.

It defines:

attributes:
_verbose - Enable/Disable verbose option.
tool_operational - Control ATS operational functionality.
xml2obj - In API for information.
obj2xml - Out API for information.
option_parser - Option parser for ATS.
methods:
__init__ - Initial XmlBase constructor.
is_tool_ok - Check is tool operational.
_verbose: bool¶
is_tool_ok() → bool[source]¶

Checking is tool operational.

Returns:

True (tool is operational) | False.

Return type:

<bool>

Exceptions:

None

obj2xml: Object2Xml¶
option_parser: ATSOptionParser¶
tool_operational: bool¶
verbose = 'ATS_UTILITIES'¶
xml2obj: Xml2Object¶
